item.title: EA Shareholders Approve Over-Inflated $55 Billion Sale To Saudi Arabia
item.content:encoded:
EA’s shareholders are clearly keen on a buy-out, no matter where the money comes from. The sale, that would see the 43-year-old company become majority owned by the Saudi Arabia Public Investment Fund (PIF), could go ahead by the beginning of 2027 pending government approval, now that public investors have voted in favor of the deal. And government approval might not be too tricky, given Trump’s son-in-law Jared Kushner would also benefit from 1.1 percent of the deal.

The full deal will see EA become a private company, 37 years after it originally went public, with ownership unevenly split between three groups. The vast majority—an enormous 93.4 percent—will be owned by the murderous regime of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman via Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund. That will leave 5.5 percent going to Californian private equity firm Silver Lake, and 1.1 percent for Affinity Partners, Jared Kushner’s investment firm that is, well, primarily funded by Saudi Arabia. If completed, it would mean EA stockholders will receive an enormous $210 per share.

While this will make for a nice payday for shareholders (which obviously includes EA management), it will also leave EA saddled with $20 billion in debt from paying off the ludicrously inflated share price, putting its credit rating in the sewers, and it’s hard to see how the company can sustain that. Then, of course, there’s the very significant matter of the company being almost entirely owned by a state that kills people for being gay or trans, murders journalists, and denies women many basic rights. EA employees obviously have good reason to be fearful, no matter how much the PIF may exist to whitewash the country’s actions, and there’s no way of knowing how the ownership might affect everything from basic company policy to what’s included in games.

Given the precarious state in which this deal would leave an impossibly indebted EA, and the likely exodus of both those let go in attempt to combat crippling costs and those who leave in disgust, it seems extremely unlikely EA could survive in any recognizable form. While games like FC26 and Battlefield 6 are huge successes, they’re also massive investments for smaller returns when compared to the mobile slop that makes up more than half of the games industry’s $200 billion value.

The deal will certainly face lengthy scrutiny around the world, just as we saw with Microsoft’s $67 billion buyout of Activision Blizzard King, although it could have a far easier ride in the U.S. While the FTC fought hard against the Microsoft deal, all bets are off under Trump, and Kushner’s involvement could certainly help grease the wheels.

From the shareholders’ perspective, however, EA is a company that’s stalled and lacked for enough big hits in recent years, and hasn’t looked likely to turn things around for a long while. This is an opportunity to get out with a big profit, no matter the human cost, nor the company’s future.

item.title: Forget Marshall and JBL, Bose SoundLink Max Bluetooth Speakers Go on Clearance at a Record Low
item.content:encoded:
A portable speaker is a much if you want to spend time sharing your favorite music with others, no matter where you go. And we’ve found one that you can get at a great price. Able to deliver powerful, rich sound anywhere you go, the Bose SoundLink Max is a top-of-the-line, fully-featured portable Bluetooth speaker designed to make your home, backyard, office, etc., sound as good as you think it should.

If you’re looking for a solidly-built, reliable, and powerful portable Bluetooth speaker, you owe it to yourself to take a closer look at the SoundLink Max. You can currently find it on sale at Amazon for $279, a savings of $120 (or 30% off) compared to its original retail price of $399.

See at Amazon

A booming portable speaker that’s perfect for any type of music

This speaker can fill a room with balanced audio, no matter what type of music you listen to. It produces crisp, detailed highs and defined mids and lows that provide deep, tight bass that will not boom out of control.

Whether you’re listening to smooth jazz, hip-hop or a mixed playlist with many different styles of music, the sound produced by the SoundLink Max is always going to be vibrant and engaging and never dull or muddy sounding. That’s more than you can say for so many other models of speaker, so this one might end up being the one that you pick if you’re looking to buy a new speaker.

As with most other Bluetooth speakers, pairing your phone, tablet or computer with the SoundLink Max is a fast and reliable process, using the speaker’s built-in Bluetooth technology. Once paired, you can walk away from your device and still keep your music playing without dropping the signal. Plus, you’ll be able to control the playback directly from your device, allowing you to continue listening without being tethered to the device itself.

As far as battery life goes, the SoundLink Max has a long-lasting battery that will give you hours of listening time after each charge cycle, eliminating the need to find a wall outlet every hour or two to recharge. Recharging is easy too since the charging cable is provided and can plug right into the device and start recharging immediately.

All things considered, the Bose SoundLink Max Bluetooth Speaker provides a solid combination of sound quality, connectivity options, and durability in one highly-portable package. And at the current sale price of $279 on Amazon, a $120 savings, it really is a compelling option for anyone who wants a portable Bluetooth speaker that produces great sound and can withstand the test of time. Make good on your New Year’s resolution for better audio.

item.title: Xbox Series X Is Back in Stock at an All-Time Low for Another Clearance Push, While PlayStation Stays Sold Out
item.content:encoded:
Gamers looking to upgrade their gaming setup for 2026 – we’ve got great news.

Amazon is currently offering a modest 8% discount on the Xbox Series X, which brings its price down to just $600, from $650. It’s not a massive discount, sure, but considering how the console rarely goes on sale, it’s still a win. Additionally, the bundle comes with a wireless controller, meaning you’re getting a setup that’s ready to be used right away. Placing your orders today will help ensure the console arrives before New Year’s, which is great if you’re planning to game with friends over the holidays.

See at Amazon

Immersive Gaming

The package includes the Xbox Series X console, one Xbox Wireless Controller, an ultra-high-speed HDMI cable, a power cable, and 2 AA batteries. That’s everything you need to get started with your favorite titles right away.

The console itself features a stunning black finish for a premium look with a slim frame that makes it easy to fit into any gaming station with ease. Its 4K capabilities paired with up to 120 FPS bring all the different worlds to life with vivid imagery and sharper details. You will enjoy an immersive gaming experience with details like never before.

The console is backward compatible, meaning you will be able to play four generations of games, including titles that are originally optimized for Xbox Series X|S. Xbox One games can be continued with your progress, achievements, and friends lists, while accessories (controllers, headsets, and more) can also be paired with Series X without a problem.

New games like The Outer Worlds 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and Grounded 2 will be ready to go from day one, too, plus you can choose from hundreds of high-quality options on console, PC, and cloud with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Basically, you’ll never be out of worlds to discover and battles to fight.

Series X offers lightning-fast load times that let you get into action within seconds. Additionally, the Quick Resume feature makes it easy to switch between games and pick up right where you left off later. For instance, if you’re exploring the Outer World but want to kick some bad guys in Call of Duty, switch to the latter instantly. Then, come back to exactly where you were once you’re done. The 1TB built-in storage is more than enough to keep all your favorites in a single place without feeling limited. As for the controller, it’s designed to offer comfort and control. You will be able to game for extended periods with ease.

There’s a lot more to like about this Xbox Series X bundle, especially at its current price. For $600, you’re getting a top-rated console that’s going to take your gaming experience to the next level. Shipping is also free, which brings the overall cost down even further. Note that deals this good don’t last long. It’s best to get your orders in as soon as you can to avoid paying the full price. It’s also a good time to use the savings towards additional accessories for a fuller setup.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE (2025) Crash to All-Time Low on Amazon With This-Week Delivery, While AirPods Pro 3 Ship in 2026
item.content:encoded:
If you’ve been looking for a premium pair of earbuds that offer impressive sound and a long-lasting battery without blowing your budget, we’ve got good news.

The latest Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE are currently going for just $110 at Amazon, after the retailer took a massive 27% off their usual $150 price. The offer applies to both the classic black and the stunning gray color options, but there’s a catch. The discount is only around for today. It ends at midnight, which means you don’t have a lot of time left to save. Additionally, you’re also getting a two-month free trial to Audible with your purchase, which adds even more value to the deal. We highly recommend placing your orders before it’s too late.

See at Amazon

Two Distinct Listening Modes

This stylish pair of earbuds features a sleek blade design with newly redesigned round eartips that keep the buds securely in place. The lightweight frame makes it easy to wear them for long; perfect for never-ending commutes and extensive workout sessions. Samsung has packed these with a bigger 11mm dynamic speaker with rich bass and powerful sound that brings all your favorite music to life. You will be able to enjoy all those energy-packed tracks during the day, plus calming theme songs at night, to the fullest.

There are two listening modes to choose from; active noise canceling and transparency mode. The ANC mode blocks all external background distractions to deliver an immersive listening experience. It’s great for when you want to block the outside world for a bit, such as when in a coffee shop or in a packed subway. The transparency mode, on the other hand, lets external sounds in while still delivering solid audio. It’s designed to keep you aware of your surroundings.

Catching up with friends on the go and taking work meetings will be just as easy, thanks to the added microphone and enhanced background noise reduction. These come together to isolate your sound from all that chatter and laughter in the background, ensuring you come through clearly on the other end. Gemini support also makes it easy to communicate with the smart assistant throughout the day without pulling your phone out. Just say something like, “Hey Google, what’s the weather today?”, and you will have your answers within seconds.

Managing music and taking calls can be done right through the buds. A simple pinch lets you play audio, pause songs, and attend calls. Similarly, simply swiping the blade adjusts the volume. Another feature that deserves a mention is real-time translation, which converts spoken audio into your preferred language on the fly. Battery-wise, you’re looking at around 8.5 hours of listening with ANC off, and a total of 30 hours with the charging case. You can easily go a couple of days without worrying about plugging these in.

All things considered, the Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE are a great option for anyone looking to enjoy powerful sound, deep bass, stable battery life, and hands-free AI assistance. This deal brings the total down to $110, which is nothing considering all the features the pair comes packed with. Additionally, you’re getting a two-month free trial to Audible, which gets you instant access to a wide range of audiobooks, podcasts, and Audible Originals.

Be sure to grab the discount sooner rather than later, as the deal is only going to be around for a few more hours.
